name: Mobile Cube Game (Early Dev)
description:
Jump from wall to wall to avoid obstacles! this is in early development, so expect many bugs, unfinished features, and placeholder items. let me know if you have any ideas for features, mechanics, obstacles, "sections"/"levels" or "stages"/"themes", or anything else! 

you may get an error for webgl on android devices. to play the game on android, download the apk on an android device, locate the apk in the files,  and run the apk. an error will (likely) pop up saying that the game is from an unknown developer, follow the instructions it gives to allow the apk to run (note: do not do this with other files you do not trust, as it can potentially be unsafe) run the apk and you should be good to go!
